TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit AppDomainSetup extends System.Object implements class System.IAppDomainSetup
Public NotInheritable Class AppDomainSetup Implements IAppDomainSetup
public ref class AppDomainSetup sealed : IAppDomainSetup

summary.span: 表示可加入至 的執行個體的組件 (Assembly) 繫結資訊。

span.span: Represents assembly binding information that can be added to an instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更的屬性執行個體不會影響任何現有。Changing the properties of an instance does not affect any existing . 它可能會影響建立新的，當方法呼叫做為參數的執行個體。It can affect only the creation of a new , when the method is called with the instance as a parameter. 這個類別會實作 介面。This class implements the interface. > [!CAUTION] > 預設值為屬性為 false。The default value for the property is false. 這項設定是不安全的服務。This setting is unsafe for services. 為了避免服務下載部分信任程式碼，將此屬性設定為 trueTo help prevent services from downloading partially trusted code, set this property to true

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: The activation context to be used for an application domain.

summary.span: 使用指定之啟動內容初始化 類別的新執行個體 (此啟動內容是用於應用程式定義域之資訊清單為主的啟動作業)。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified activation context to use for manifest-based activation of an application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件指定`activationContext`用來產生物件，其中包含啟動新的應用程式定義域所需的資訊。The object specified for `activationContext` is used to generate an object containing information required to activate a new application domain. 這物件可以使用來存取屬性。This object can be accessed by using the property.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified activation arguments required for manifest-based activation of an application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的物件`activationArguments`可以使用來存取屬性。The object specified for `activationArguments` can be accessed by using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property AppDomainInitializer ^ AppDomainInitializer { AppDomainInitializer ^ get(); void set(AppDomainInitializer ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 委派，其表示當初始化應用程式定義域時所叫用的回呼方法。

span.span: Gets or sets the delegate, which represents a callback method that is invoked when the application domain is initialized.

value.span: 表示回呼方法的委派，在應用程式定義域初始化時會叫用此方法。

span.span: A delegate that represents a callback method that is invoked when the application domain is initialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要將資訊傳遞至回呼方法，將指定的字串陣列屬性。To pass information to the callback method, assign an array of strings to the property. 的陣列傳遞至回呼方法，每次已初始化。The array is passed to the callback method each time an is initialized. 新建立的應用程式定義域的內容中執行的回呼方法。The callback method is executed in the context of the newly created application domain. ## Examples 下列範例會建立名為的子應用程式定義域`ChildDomain`，並使用物件和來自預設應用程式定義域的辨識項。The following example creates a child application domain named `ChildDomain`, using an object and evidence from the default application domain. 屬性設定為回呼方法`AppDomainInit`，子定義域初始化時會叫用。The property is set to the callback method `AppDomainInit`, which is invoked when the child domain is initialized. 回呼方法的引數會放在字串指派給陣列屬性。The arguments for the callback method are placed in an array of strings, which is assigned to the property. 建立子網域時，回呼方法只會列印字串。When the child domain is created, the callback method simply prints the strings. [!code-cpp[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ AppDomainInitializerArguments { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定傳遞給 委派表示的回呼方法之引數。

span.span: Gets or sets the arguments passed to the callback method represented by the delegate.

summary.span: 當初始化應用程式定義域時，會叫用此回呼方法。

span.span: The callback method is invoked when the application domain is initialized.

value.span: 在 初始化期間叫用此回呼方法時，傳遞給 委派表示的回呼方法之字串陣列。

span.span: An array of strings that is passed to the callback method represented by the delegate, when the callback method is invoked during initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定期間所叫用的回呼方法初始化。Use the property to specify a callback method that is invoked during initialization. 如果屬性未設定，表示未使用指派給這個屬性的陣列。If the property is not set, the array assigned to this property is not used. 新建立的應用程式定義域的內容中執行的回呼方法。The callback method is executed in the context of the newly created application domain. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立名為的子應用程式定義域`ChildDomain`，並使用物件和來自預設應用程式定義域的辨識項。The following code example creates a child application domain named `ChildDomain`, using an object and evidence from the default application domain. 屬性設定為回呼方法`AppDomainInit`，子定義域初始化時會叫用。The property is set to the callback method `AppDomainInit`, which is invoked when the child domain is initialized. 回呼方法的引數會放在字串指派給陣列屬性。The arguments for the callback method are placed in an array of strings, which is assigned to the property. 建立子網域時，回呼方法只會列印字串。When the child domain is created, the callback method simply prints the strings. [!code-cpp[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AppDomainManagerAssembly { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定組件的顯示名稱，這個組件可為使用這個 物件建立的應用程式定義域，提供應用程式定義域管理員型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the display name of the assembly that provides the type of the application domain manager for application domains created using this object.

value.span: 組件的顯示名稱，這個組件可提供應用程式定義域管理員的 。

span.span: The display name of the assembly that provides the of the application domain manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的應用程式定義域管理員類型，請設定這個屬性與屬性。To specify the type of the application domain manager, set both this property and the property. 如果上述任一個屬性未設定，其他則忽略。If either of these properties is not set, the other is ignored. 如果未不提供任何型別，則應用程式定義域管理員來建立父應用程式定義域相同的型別 (也就是應用程式定義域從中方法呼叫)。If no type is provided, the application domain manager is created from the same type as the parent application domain (that is, the application domain from which the method is called). 載入應用程式定義域時，如果組件不存在，或組件不包含所指定的型別，會擲回屬性。When the application domain is loaded, is thrown if the assembly does not exist, or if the assembly does not contain the type specified by the property. 如果找到組件，但版本資訊不符合，會擲回。 is thrown if the assembly is found but the version information does not match. 若要設定的預設應用程式定義域的應用程式定義域管理員，使用[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md)和[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md)中的項目[\<執行階段 >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md)應用程式組態檔或使用環境變數中所述的區段。To set the application domain manager for the default application domain, use the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md) and [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md) elements in the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) section of the application configuration file, or use the environment variables described in . 此功能需要具有完全信任應用程式。This feature requires the application to have full trust. （例如，在桌面上執行的應用程式有完全信任）。如果應用程式並沒有完全信任，就會擲回。(For example, an application running on the desktop has full trust.) If the application does not have full trust, a is thrown. 組件顯示名稱的格式由提供屬性。The format of the assembly display name is given by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AppDomainManagerType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定型別的完整名稱，這個型別可為使用這個 物件建立的應用程式定義域，提供應用程式定義域管理員。

span.span: Gets or sets the full name of the type that provides the application domain manager for application domains created using this object.

value.span: 類型的完整名稱，包含命名空間。

span.span: The full name of the type, including the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的應用程式定義域管理員類型，請設定這個屬性與屬性。To specify the type of the application domain manager, set both this property and the property. 如果上述任一個屬性未設定，其他則忽略。If either of these properties is not set, the other is ignored. 如果未不提供任何型別，則應用程式定義域管理員來建立父應用程式定義域相同的型別 (也就是應用程式定義域從中方法呼叫)。If no type is provided, the application domain manager is created from the same type as the parent application domain (that is, the application domain from which the method is called). 載入應用程式定義域時，如果所指定的組件，會擲回屬性不包含這個屬性所指定的型別。When the application domain is loaded, is thrown if the assembly specified by the property does not contain the type specified by this property. 若要設定的預設應用程式定義域的應用程式定義域管理員，使用[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md)和[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md)中的項目[\<執行階段 >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md)應用程式組態檔或使用環境變數中所述的區段。To set the application domain manager for the default application domain, use the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md) and [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md) elements in the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) section of the application configuration file, or use the environment variables described in . 此功能需要具有完全信任應用程式。This feature requires the application to have full trust. （例如，在桌面上執行的應用程式有完全信任）。如果應用程式並沒有完全信任，就會擲回。(For example, an application running on the desktop has full trust.) If the application does not have full trust, a is thrown. 類型的完整名稱的格式由提供屬性。The format of the full name of a type is given by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ApplicationBase { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定包含應用程式的目錄名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the directory containing the application.

value.span: 應用程式基底目錄的名稱。

span.span: The name of the application base directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式基底目錄是組件管理員開始探查組件。The application base directory is where the assembly manager begins probing for assemblies. 屬性可能會影響應用程式定義域授與的權限。The property can influence which permissions are granted to an application domain. 例如，通常來自本機電腦的應用程式定義域收到完全信任的來源的位置。For example, an application domain originating from the local computer normally receives full trust based on its location of origin. 不過，如果屬性，設定內部網路目錄的完整名稱為設定會限制授與權限 LocalIntranet 授與應用程式定義域即使應用程式定義域確實來自本機電腦。However, if the property of that is set to the full name of an intranet directory, the setting restricts the permissions granted to the application domain to a LocalIntranet grant even though the application domain actually originates from the local computer. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來設定組件載入器開始探查組件載入到新的應用程式定義域的位置。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to set the location where the assembly loader begins probing for assemblies to load into a new application domain. > [!NOTE] > 您必須確定您指定的資料夾存在。You must ensure that the folder you specify exists. [!code-cpp[ADApplicationBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADApplicationBase/CPP/adapplicationbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADApplicationBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADApplicationBase/CS/adapplicationbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADApplicationBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADApplicationBase/VB/adapplicationbase.vb#1)]

span.span: for access to the path information.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ApplicationName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application.

value.span: 應用程式的名稱。

span.span: The name of the application.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定當您建立新的應用程式定義域的屬性。The following example shows how to set the property when you create a new application domain. 此範例會建立新的應用程式定義域，然後呼叫方法範例組件載入到新的應用程式定義域，並建立的執行個體`Worker`類別。The example creates a new application domain, and then calls the method to load the example assembly into the new application domain and create an instance of the `Worker` class. `Worker`類別會繼承，所以此範例可以使用所傳回的 proxy呼叫`TestLoad`方法。The `Worker` class inherits , so the example can use the proxy returned by to call the `TestLoad` method. `TestLoad`方法載入組件，您所指定。The `TestLoad` method loads an assembly that you specify. 您必須指定有效、 完整的組件名稱，或標記為註解方法。You must either specify a valid, fully qualified assembly name, or comment out the method. `TestLoad`方法列出載入新的應用程式定義域，顯示您指定的組件和範例組件會載入的組件。The `TestLoad` method lists the assemblies that are loaded into the new application domain, showing that your specified assembly and the example assembly are loaded. 此範例會使用告知如何應用程式時，將應用程式定義域之間共用程式碼的組件載入器的屬性。The example uses the attribute to tell the assembly loader how the application will share code across application domains. [!code-cpp[ADMultiDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADMultiDomain/CPP/admultidomain.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADMultiDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADMultiDomain/CS/admultidomain.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADMultiDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADMultiDomain/VB/admultidomain.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Policy::ApplicationTrust ^ ApplicationTrust { System::Security::Policy::ApplicationTrust ^ get(); void set(System::Security::Policy::ApplicationTrust ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定包含安全性和信任資訊的物件。

span.span: Gets or sets an object containing security and trust information.

value.span: 包含安全性和信任資訊的物件。

span.span: An object that contains security and trust information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是`null`時建立。This property is `null` when the is created. 一旦變更，無法重設為 null 參考。Once changed, it cannot be reset to a null reference.

exception.span: 此屬性會設定為 物件，而此物件的應用程式識別不符合 屬性傳回的 物件之應用程式識別。

span.span: The property is set to an object whose application identity does not match the application identity of the object returned by the property.

exception.span: 如果 屬性為 ，則不會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: No exception is thrown if the property is .
The property is set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CachePath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得和設定其中的檔案已陰影複製的應用程式特定區域的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of an area specific to the application where files are shadow copied.

value.span: 陰影複製之檔案的目錄路徑與檔案名稱的完整限定名稱。

span.span: The fully qualified name of the directory path and file name where files are shadow copied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了讓此屬性，讓效果，請也必須設定屬性。In order for this property to have an effect, the property must also be set. 如果未設定屬性，屬性會被忽略，且陰影複本快取位置的預設值為下載快取。If the property is not set, the property is ignored and the shadow copy cache location defaults to the download cache. 如需有關陰影複製的詳細資訊，請參閱[陰影複製組件](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。For more information on shadow copying, see [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).

span.span: for access to the path information.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ConfigurationFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得和設定應用程式定義域的組態檔名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the configuration file for an application domain.

value.span: 組態檔的名稱。

span.span: The name of the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組態檔會描述應用程式定義域的組態資料與搜尋規則。The configuration file describes the search rules and configuration data for the application domain. 建立應用程式定義域的主機會負責提供這項資料，因為有意義的值不同的狀況。The host that creates the application domain is responsible for supplying this data because the meaningful values vary from situation to situation. 例如，ASP.NET 應用程式的組態資料會儲存為每個應用程式、 網站和電腦，而可執行檔的組態資料會儲存每個應用程式、 使用者及電腦。For example, the configuration data for ASP.NET applications is stored for each application, site, and computer, while the configuration data for an executable is stored for each application, user, and computer. 只有主機才會知道組態資料的詳細資訊，為特定狀況。Only the host knows the specifics of the configuration data for a particular circumstance.

span.span: for access to the path information.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisallowApplicationBaseProbing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指定當搜尋要載入的組件時，是否要探查應用程式基底路徑和私用二進位路徑。

span.span: Specifies whether the application base path and private binary path are probed when searching for assemblies to load.

value.span: 如果不允許探查，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if probing is not allowed; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`true`，值屬性會被忽略。If the property is `true`, the value of the property is ignored. 也就是任何組件會探查如中所指定目錄屬性。That is, no assemblies are probed for in the directories specified by the property. 此外，值屬性和屬性會被忽略。In addition, the values of the property and the property are ignored. 所指定之目錄中任何組件探查的屬性。No assemblies are probed for in the directories specified by the property. 屬性會提供額外的控制載入程序。The property provides an additional layer of control over the loading process. 標準的組件載入順序時，應用程式基底會探查之前就會引發事件。In the normal assembly loading sequence, the application base is probed before the event is raised. 不過，某些應用程式可能需要從 OLE 複合檔案的文件，或從唯一的已知位置不在全域組件快取和所指定之目錄中載入的組件和屬性。However, some applications might need to load assemblies from an OLE compound file within a document, or from a unique known location that is neither in the global assembly cache nor in the directories specified by the and properties. 這類應用程式可以使用屬性以避免一般探查時，所造成的延遲，並避免載入必要可能位在一般的探查路徑中的組件的複本。Such applications can use the property to avoid the delay caused by normal probing, and to avoid loading copies of the necessary assembly that might be located in the normal probing paths.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisallowBindingRedirects { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示應用程式定義域是否允許組件繫結重新導向。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an application domain allows assembly binding redirection.

value.span: 如果不允許組件重新導向，則為 ；如果允許，則為 。

span.span: if redirection of assemblies is not allowed; if it is allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設計用於服務和伺服器應用程式組件繫結重新導向不是屬於應用程式的情況。The property is designed to be used by services and server applications where assembly binding redirection is not part of the application scenario.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisallowCodeDownload { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示應用程式定義域是否允許以 HTTP 下載組件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether HTTP download of assemblies is allowed for an application domain.

value.span: 如果不允許以 HTTP 下載組件，則為 ；如果允許，則為 。

span.span: if HTTP download of assemblies is not allowed; if it is allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設計用於服務和伺服器應用程式從內部網路或網際網路下載的程式碼不是屬於應用程式的情況。The property is designed to be used by services and server applications where downloading code from an intranet or the Internet is not part of the application scenario. > [!CAUTION] > 預設值為屬性是`false`。The default value for the property is `false`. 這項設定是不安全的服務。This setting is unsafe for services. 為了避免服務下載部分信任程式碼，將此屬性設定為`true`。To help prevent services from downloading partially trusted code, set this property to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisallowPublisherPolicy { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出組態檔的 [<publisherPolicy>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/publisherpolicy-element.md) 區段是否套用至應用程式定義域。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the [<publisherPolicy>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/publisherpolicy-element.md) section of the configuration file is applied to an application domain.

value.span: 如果忽略應用程式定義域之組態檔的 區段，則為 ；如果遵循所宣告的發行者原則，則為 。

span.span: if the section of the configuration file for an application domain is ignored; if the declared publisher policy is honored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性特別適用於在本機載入 Web 應用程式。The property specifically applies to a Web application that is loaded locally. 使用這個屬性來協助防止惡意嘗試在安全模式中執行不安全的 Web 應用程式。Use this property to help prevent a malicious attempt to execute an unsafe Web application in safe mode. 如需略過發行者原則的詳細資訊，請參閱[重新導向組件版本](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/redirect-assembly-versions.md)主題。For more information about bypassing publisher policy, see the [Redirecting Assembly Versions](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/redirect-assembly-versions.md) topic. 如需安全模式的詳細資訊，請參閱的 < 檢查組態檔案 > 一節[執行階段如何找出組件](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md)主題。For more information about safe mode, see the "Examining the Configuration Files" section of the [How the Runtime Locates Assemblies](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md) topic.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DynamicBase { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定動態產生的檔案之目錄所在的基底目錄。

span.span: Gets or sets the base directory where the directory for dynamically generated files is located.

value.span: 所在的目錄。

span.span: The directory where the is located.

para.span: 這個屬性的傳回值不同於指派的值。

span.span: The return value of this property is different from the value assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來設定基底目錄即將放置新的應用程式定義域的動態目錄。Use this property to set the base directory where the dynamic directory for the new application domain will be located. 當新的應用程式定義域中的程式碼會載入組件、 組件解析看起來正常的探查路徑中的第一個。When code in the new application domain loads an assembly, assembly resolution looks first in the normal probing paths. 如果找不到組件，它會尋找在動態的目錄中，由屬性。If it does not find the assembly, it looks in the dynamic directory, which is returned by the property. 動態組件會載入並執行新的應用程式定義域可以放在該處。Dynamic assemblies that will be loaded and executed by the new application domain can be placed there. 當您指派的路徑屬性，就會加入額外的子目錄，則這個子目錄的名稱是指派給值的雜湊碼屬性。When you assign a path to the property, an additional subdirectory is added; the name of this subdirectory is the hash code of the value assigned to the property. 因此，之後這個屬性所傳回的基底目錄一定是不同於指派的值。Thus, the base directory subsequently returned by this property is always different from the value assigned. > [!IMPORTANT] > 將值指派給這個屬性不會建立任何目錄。Assigning a value to this property does not create any directories. 目錄必須建立或驗證的程式碼使用它們。The directories must be created or verified by the code that uses them. 動態的目錄是子目錄的。The dynamic directory is a subdirectory of . 其簡單的名稱是所傳回的值屬性，因此其格式是*原始路徑*\\*雜湊碼*\\*應用程式名稱*.Its simple name is the value returned by the property, so its format is *original path*\\*hash code*\\*application name*. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用載入動態組件時，探查路徑設為應用程式定義域的屬性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to set the path an application domain probes when loading dynamic assemblies. 此範例會建立物件，然後設定其「 範例 」 的屬性和其"C:\DynamicAssemblyDir"的屬性。The example creates an object and sets its property to "Example" and its property to "C:\DynamicAssemblyDir". 此範例接著會顯示屬性，以顯示應用程式名稱的雜湊碼，做為原本指派路徑的子目錄已附加。The example then displays the property, to show that the hash code of the application name has been appended as a subdirectory of the path that was originally assigned. > [!NOTE] > 在此範例中的基底目錄就是要外之探查路徑中的範例應用程式。The base directory in this example is intended to be outside the probing path for the example application. 請務必編譯此範例中不同的位置。Be sure to compile the example in a different location. 刪除基底目錄和其所有子目錄每次您執行範例。Delete the base directory and all its subdirectories each time you run the example. 此範例會建立新的應用程式網域使用物件。The example creates a new application domain using the object. 這個範例會建立動態的目錄，如果不存在。The example then creates the dynamic directory if it does not already exist. 雖然此範例會使用應用程式定義域的屬性，即可取得動態目錄的名稱就可輕鬆地建立目錄事先藉由串連的原始路徑，雜湊程式碼的應用程式名稱，而應用程式名稱。Although the example uses the application domain's property to get the name of the dynamic directory, it could just as easily create the directory beforehand by concatenating the original path, the hash code of the application name, and the application name. 此範例包含`GenerateDynamicAssembly`方法發出的組件名為`DynamicHelloWorld.dll`並將它儲存在新的應用程式定義域動態目錄中。The example has a `GenerateDynamicAssembly` method that emits an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and stores it in the new application domain's dynamic directory. 動態組件包含一種類型， `HelloWorld`，具有靜態方法 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中的方法) 名為`HelloFromAD`。The dynamic assembly contains one type, `HelloWorld`, that has a static method (`Shared` method in Visual Basic) named `HelloFromAD`. 呼叫這個方法會顯示應用程式網域的名稱。Calling this method displays the name of the application domain. `Example`類別衍生自，因此此範例可以建立類別的執行個體中的新應用程式定義域和呼叫其`Test`方法。The `Example` class derives from , so the example can create an instance of the class in the new application domain and call its `Test` method. `Test`方法會依其顯示名稱載入的動態組件，並呼叫靜態`HelloFromAD`方法。The `Test` method loads the dynamic assembly by its display name and calls the static `HelloFromAD` method. 您可以顯示動態目錄搜尋一般探查路徑之後，撰寫程式碼組件名為`DynamicHelloWorld.dll`及編譯此範例中的相同目錄中。You can show that the dynamic directory is searched after the normal probing paths by writing code for an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and compiling it in the same directory as this example. 組件必須具有名為類別`HelloWorld`的靜態方法，名為`HelloFromAD`。The assembly must have a class named `HelloWorld` with a static method named `HelloFromAD`. 這個方法不需要具有相同的功能與在範例中。它只可以在主控台中顯示字串。This method does not have to have the same functionality as the one in the example; it can simply display a string to the console. 組件也必須其版本設定為 1.0.0.0 設定的屬性。The assembly must also have an attribute that sets its version to 1.0.0.0. 當您執行範例時，才能動態目錄中搜尋找到您目前的目錄中編譯的組件。When you run the example, the assembly you compiled in the current directory is found before the dynamic directory is searched. [!code-cpp[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/CPP/addynamicbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/CS/addynamicbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/VB/addynamicbase.vb#1)]

exception.span: 無法設定這個屬性，因為應用程式定義域中的應用程式名稱為 。

span.span: This property cannot be set because the application name on the application domain is .
for access to the path information.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetConfigurationBytes() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回 方法設定的 XML 組態資訊，此方法會覆寫應用程式的 XML 組態資訊。

span.span: Returns the XML configuration information set by the method, which overrides the application's XML configuration information.

returns.span: 包含 方法所設定之 XML 組態資訊的陣列；如果尚未呼叫 方法，則為 。

span.span: An array that contains the XML configuration information that was set by the method, or if the method has not been called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用來建立新的應用程式定義域的應用程式的組態資訊會覆寫。The method provides a way to override the configuration information of an application that creates a new application domain. 中的設定檔資訊`value`覆寫應用程式的組態檔資訊。The configuration file information in `value` overrides the configuration file information for the application. 例如，當 Example.exe 應用程式建立新的應用程式定義域時，它可以覆寫原先取自 Example.exe.config 檔案的組態資訊。For example, when the Example.exe application creates a new application domain, it can override the configuration information originally obtained from Example.exe.config file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 部分的設定檔資訊的取用者不會使用儲存的資訊方法。Some consumers of configuration file information do not use the information stored by the method. 執行階段不會強制這個屬性。The runtime does not enforce this. 若要確保新的應用程式定義域中會覆寫所有的設定檔資訊，請使用屬性來指定組態檔。To ensure that all configuration file information is overridden in a new application domain, use the property to specify a configuration file. 方法，並會影響組件繫結。The method does affect assembly binding. 中的 XML`value`等同於一般的組態檔中的 XML 之處在於它會儲存為陣列。The XML in `value` is the same as the XML in a normal configuration file, except that it is stored as a array. 若要存取應用程式定義域的組態位元組，請使用屬性來取得物件的應用程式定義域，然後使用方法。To access the configuration bytes for an application domain, use the property to get the object for the application domain, then use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ LicenseFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與這個定義域相關聯的使用權檔案的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the license file associated with this domain.

value.span: 授權檔的位置和名稱。

span.span: The location and name of the license file.
for access to the path information.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property LoaderOptimization LoaderOptimization { LoaderOptimization get(); void set(LoaderOptimization value); };

summary.span: 指定用來載入可執行檔的最佳化原則。

span.span: Specifies the optimization policy used to load an executable.

value.span: 和 一起使用的列舉常數。

span.span: An enumerated constant that is used with the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立動態組件，並將它儲存至磁碟，然後使用屬性來設定用來將應用程式定義域載入組件的最佳化原則。The following example creates a dynamic assembly and saves it to disk, and then uses the property to set the optimization policy used to load the assembly into an application domain. [!code-cpp[ADDyno#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDyno/CPP/addyno.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADDyno#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDyno/CS/addyno.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADDyno#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDyno/VB/addyno.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ PartialTrustVisibleAssemblies { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定標記有 旗標之組件的清單，這些組件設成對沙箱應用程式定義域中執行的部分信任程式碼為可見的。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of assemblies marked with the flag that are made visible to partial-trust code running in a sandboxed application domain.

value.span: 部分組件名稱的陣列，其中每一個部分名稱都是由簡易組件名稱和公開金鑰組成。

span.span: An array of partial assembly names, where each partial name consists of the simple assembly name and the public key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開頭為[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、 (APTCA) 屬性才能進行條件式藉由設定其屬性。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the (APTCA) attribute can be made conditional by setting its property to . 已標記 APTCA 組件除非主應用程式可讓它無法供部分信任程式碼。An APTCA assembly that is marked with cannot be used by partially trusted code unless the host application allows it. 沙箱化應用程式定義域的主機可允許使用條件式 APTCA 屬性中的組件，藉由建立陣列，其中包含的簡單名稱和公開金鑰的每個組件，並將陣列指派給這個屬性的應用程式定義域中的程式碼。The host of a sandboxed application domain allows code in the application domain to use assemblies with conditional APTCA attributes by creating an array that contains the simple name and public key of each assembly, and assigning the array to this property. 例如，陣列項目看起來可能如下所示:"MyAssembly，PublicKey "。For example, an element of the array might look like the following: "MyAssembly, ". > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您使用的子類別，並定義它的組件相依於以條件式 APTCA 屬性標記的組件時，您必須包含這些組件的清單中，您將傳遞給屬性您用於建立應用程式定義域。If you are using a subclass of , and the assembly that defines it depends on assemblies that are marked with the conditional APTCA attribute, you must include those assemblies in the list that you pass to the property of the you use to create application domains. 否則會使用條件式 APTCA 屬性標示組件將會停用。Otherwise the assemblies that are marked with the conditional APTCA attribute will be disabled. > [!NOTE] > 當您偵錯的應用程式，在沙箱化應用程式網域中，執行某些訊息可能會產生誤導。When you are debugging an application that is running in a sandboxed application domain, some messages can be misleading. 例如，訊息可能狀態，您完全信任組件的其中一個只具有有限的權限，當實際問題的原因是超過沙箱化應用程式網域的授權集的安全性要求已傳播至的界限沙箱應用程式定義域但失敗。For example, a message might state that one of your fully trusted assemblies has only limited permissions, when the real cause of the problem is that a security demand that exceeds the grant set of the sandboxed application domain has propagated to the boundary of the sandboxed application domain and failed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PrivateBinPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在應用程式基底目錄之下用於探查私用組件的目錄清單。

span.span: Gets or sets the list of directories under the application base directory that are probed for private assemblies.

value.span: 以分號分隔的目錄名稱清單。

span.span: A list of directory names separated by semicolons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 私用組件會部署在相同的目錄結構與應用程式。Private assemblies are deployed in the same directory structure as the application. 如果針對指定的目錄底下不，便會予以忽略。If the directories specified for are not under , they are ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PrivateBinPathProbe { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字串值，此字串值會在應用程式的搜尋路徑中加入或排除 ，並僅搜尋 。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value that includes or excludes from the search path for the application, and searches only .

value.span: Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 ) 表示要在搜尋組件時包含應用程式基底路徑。任何非 Null 字串值則表示不包含路徑。

span.span: A null reference ( in Visual Basic) to include the application base path when searching for assemblies; any non-null string value to exclude the path.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為任何非 null 字串值，包括("")，若要排除的應用程式的目錄路徑，也就是— 應用程式，並搜尋組件的搜尋路徑中只能在。Set this property to any non-null string value, including (""), to exclude the application directory path — that is, — from the search path for the application, and to search for assemblies only in .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SandboxInterop { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否已停用應用程式定義域中 Interop 呼叫的介面快取，以便在每個呼叫上執行 QueryInterface。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether interface caching is disabled for interop calls in the application domain, so that a QueryInterface is performed on each call.

value.span: 如果停用應用程式定義域中使用目前 物件建立之 Interop 呼叫的介面快取則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if interface caching is disabled for interop calls in application domains created with the current object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 停用介面快取 interop 呼叫的效能有重大影響。Disabling interface caching has a significant impact on the performance of interop calls. 這個成員在引進[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。This member is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetCompatibilitySwitches(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> switches) cil managed
Public Sub SetCompatibilitySwitches (switches As IEnumerable(Of String))

param.name: switches
param.span: 可用來指定相容性參數的字串值可列舉集，或 以清除現有的相容性參數。

span.span: An enumerable set of string values that specify compatibility switches, or to erase the existing compatibility switches.

summary.span: 針對指定的問題來設定指定的參數，讓應用程式定義域與舊版 .NET Framework 相容。

span.span: Sets the specified switches, making the application domain compatible with previous versions of the .NET Framework for the specified issues.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要版本的.NET framework 有時會引進重大變更來自舊版本。Major versions of the .NET Framework sometimes introduce breaking changes from the previous version. 例如，[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]導入的重大變更的少數[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。For example, the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] introduces a small number of breaking changes from the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. 使用方法，以指定的一或多個這些重大變更將會回復要讓其行為與舊版的.NET Framework 相容的應用程式定義域。Use the method to specify that one or more of these breaking changes should be rolled back for the application domain, to make the behavior compatible with the previous version of the .NET Framework. 每次呼叫這個方法，它會取代現有參數設定。Each time you call this method, it replaces the existing switch settings. 若要清除的設定值，指定`null`如`switches`參數。To erase the settings, specify `null` for the `switches` parameter. 為所提供的字串值組`switches`可以是簡單的字串陣列，因為陣列實作介面。The set of string values you provide for `switches` can be a simple string array, because arrays implement the interface. 下表提供可以還原舊版.NET Framework 的行為設定的相容性參數的範例。The following table provides examples of compatibility switches that can be set to restore the behavior of earlier versions of the .NET Framework. |參數Switch|意義Meaning| |------------|-------------| |"NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy""NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy"|程式碼存取安全性 (CAS)[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]啟用這個應用程式定義域中。Code access security (CAS) for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain. 請參閱[ <NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)。See [<NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md).| |"NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior""NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior"|排序的預設值的字串[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]這個應用程式定義域中已啟用。String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] are enabled in this application domain. 已成功還原舊版的排序行為也需要 sort00001000.dll 動態連結程式庫，可在本機系統上。Successfully restoring legacy sorting behavior also requires the sort00001000.dll dynamic link library to be available on the local system. 請參閱[ <CompatSortNLSVersion>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md)。See [<CompatSortNLSVersion> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md).| |"NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior""NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior"|排序的預設值的字串[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]而且 Unicode 5.0 已啟用這個應用程式定義域中。String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] and Unicode 5.0 are enabled in this application domain. 已成功還原舊版的排序行為也需要 sort00060101.dll 動態連結程式庫，可在本機系統上。Successfully restoring legacy sorting behavior also requires the sort00060101.dll dynamic link library to be available on the local system.| |"NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode""NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode"| 格式化行為[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]啟用這個應用程式定義域中。 formatting behavior for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain. 請參閱[ <TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md)和 「 還原舊版 TimeSpan 格式 」 的區段主題。See [<TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md) and the "Restoring Legacy TimeSpan Formatting" section of the topic.| |"UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm""UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm"|執行階段計算字串的雜湊程式碼上每個應用程式網域為基礎，而不是使用單一的雜湊演算法產生一致的雜湊程式碼在應用程式定義域。The runtime calculates hash codes for strings on a per application domain basis instead of using a single hashing algorithm that produces a consistent hash code across application domains. 請參閱[ <UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md)。See [<UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md).|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetConfigurationBytes(unsigned int8[] value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 包含用於應用程式定義域之 XML 組態資訊的陣列。

span.span: An array that contains the XML configuration information to be used for the application domain.

summary.span: 為應用程式定義域提供 XML 組態資訊，以取代應用程式的 XML 組態資訊。

span.span: Provides XML configuration information for the application domain, replacing the application's XML configuration information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用來取代建立新的應用程式定義域的應用程式的組態資訊。The method provides a way to replace the configuration information of an application that creates a new application domain. 中的設定檔資訊`value`取代應用程式的設定檔資訊。The configuration file information in `value` replaces the configuration file information for the application. 例如，當 Example.exe 應用程式建立新的應用程式定義域時，它可以取代原本取自 Example.exe.config 檔案的組態資訊。For example, when the Example.exe application creates a new application domain, it can replace the configuration information originally obtained from the Example.exe.config file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 部分的設定檔資訊的取用者不會使用儲存的資訊方法。Some consumers of configuration file information do not use the information stored by the method. 執行階段不會強制這個屬性。The runtime does not enforce this. 若要確保所有的設定檔資訊會取代新的應用程式定義域中，使用屬性來指定組態檔。To ensure that all configuration file information is replaced in a new application domain, use the property to specify a configuration file. 方法，並會影響組件繫結。The method does affect assembly binding. 中的 XML`value`等同於一般的組態檔中的 XML 之處在於它會儲存為陣列。The XML in `value` is the same as the XML in a normal configuration file, except that it is stored as a array.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetNativeFunction (string functionName, int functionVersion, IntPtr functionPointer);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetNativeFunction(string functionName, int32 functionVersion, native int functionPointer) cil managed
Public Sub SetNativeFunction (functionName As String, functionVersion As Integer, functionPointer As IntPtr)
public: void SetNativeFunction(System::String ^ functionName, int functionVersion, IntPtr functionPointer);

param.name: functionName
param.span: 要覆寫的字串比較函式的名稱。

span.span: The name of the string comparison function to override.

param.name: functionVersion

span.span: The function version.

param.span: 若是 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，其值必須為 1 或更大。

span.span: For [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], its value must be 1 or greater.

param.name: functionPointer
param.span: 覆寫 functionName 之函式的指標。

span.span: A pointer to the function that overrides functionName.

summary.span: 為 Common Language Runtime 提供字串比較函式的替代實作。

span.span: Provides the common language runtime with an alternate implementation of a string comparison function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列的字串比較和排序方法可以覆寫方法：The following string comparison and sorting methods can be overridden by the method: - `IsNLSDefinedString` - `CompareStringEx` - `LCMapStringEx` - `FindNLSStringEx` - `CompareStringOrdinal` - `GetNLSVersion` 如需這些函數的資訊，請參閱[國家語言支援函式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=228134)。For information about these functions, see [National Language Support Functions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=228134).

span.span: is .
is not 1 or greater.
-or-
is .

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ShadowCopyDirectories { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定包含要陰影複製的組件的目錄名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the names of the directories containing assemblies to be shadow copied.

value.span: 以分號分隔的目錄名稱清單。

span.span: A list of directory names separated by semicolons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用陰影複製時，預設值是要透過探查; 找到的所有組件的陰影複製也就是所指定目錄中和屬性。When shadow copying is enabled, the default is to shadow copy all assemblies found through probing; that is, in the directories specified by the and properties. 屬性會限制所指定目錄中的組件的陰影複製。The property restricts the shadow copy to the assemblies in the directories specified by . 如果您不指派字串給 屬性，或如果您將這個屬性設定為 `null`，則會陰影複製 和 屬性所指定目錄中的所有組件。If you don’t assign a string to the property, or if you set this property to `null`, all assemblies in the directories specified by the and properties are shadow copied. > [!IMPORTANT] > 目錄路徑不可包含分號，因為分號是分隔符號字元。Directory paths must not contain semicolons, because the semicolon is the delimiter character. 分號沒有逸出字元。There is no escape character for semicolons. 作用時，陰影複製，組件檔會複製到另一個位置載入組件之前。When shadow copying is in effect, assembly files are copied to another location before the assemblies are loaded. 原始的組件檔未鎖定，因此可以更新。The original assembly file is not locked, so it can be updated. 如需有關陰影複製的詳細資訊，請參閱[陰影複製組件](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。For more information on shadow copying, see [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).

span.span: for access to the path information.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ShadowCopyFiles { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定指示陰影複製是開啟或關閉的字串。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that indicates whether shadow copying is turned on or off.

value.span: 字串值 "true" 表示陰影複製為開啟，"false" 表示陰影複製為關閉。

span.span: The string value "true" to indicate that shadow copying is turned on; or "false" to indicate that shadow copying is turned off.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關陰影複製的詳細資訊，請參閱[陰影複製組件](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。For more information on shadow copying, see [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TargetFrameworkName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，以 建構函式可剖析的格式，為應用程式定義域指定 .NET Framework 的目標版本和設定檔。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies the target version and profile of the .NET Framework for the application domain, in a format that can be parsed by the constructor.

value.span: .NET Framework 的目標版本和設定檔。

span.span: The target version and profile of the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性，以判斷目前正在執行版本的.NET framework 應用程式定義域，可用來載入及執行的目標版本和設定檔的已編譯的組件。Set this property to tell the currently running version of the .NET Framework that the application domain will be used to load and run assemblies that have been compiled for the target version and profile. 如果目前執行的.NET framework 版本有選擇性的行為會影響相容性的目標版本編譯的程式碼，它可以啟用或停用這些行為，視需要以提高相容性。If the currently running version of the .NET Framework has optional behaviors that affect the compatibility of code that was compiled with the target version, it can enable or disable those behaviors, as appropriate, to improve compatibility. 當應用程式支援增益集由在個別的應用程式定義域中執行它們使用多個版本的.NET framework 編譯時，這非常有用。This can be useful when an application supports add-ins compiled with multiple versions of the .NET Framework by running them in separate application domains. 用戶端應用程式，值屬性會從推斷屬性。For client applications, the value of the property is inferred from the attribute. 在[!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)]和更新版本中，這個屬性會加入至組件會自動根據專案設定**目標 Framework**屬性。In [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] and later, this attribute is added to the assembly automatically based on the setting of the project's **Target Framework** property.
